mapper.select: select ABNORMAL_ID abnormalid, CENTER_ID centerid, GROUP_ID groupid, TEAM_ID teamid, USER_ID user_id, APPLICATION_DATE applicationdate, ERROR_TYPE errortype, OCCURRENCE_DATE occurrencedate, FINISHED_DATE finisheddate, PERIOD_START periodstart, PERIOD_END periodend, CAUSE cause, UPLOADFILE uploadfile, RECOGNITIONSTATE recognitionstate, LENGTHTIME lengthtime, HOSPITAL hospital, EDATE edate, RELATION relation, ENCLOSUREEXPLAIN enclosureexplain from abnormal where abnormal.occurrence_date <= #{now} and abnormal.FINISHED_DATE >= #{now} or (YEAR(abnormal.occurrence_date) = YEAR(NOW()) and MONTH(abnormal.occurrence_date) = MONTH(NOW())) or (YEAR(abnormal.FINISHED_DATE) = YEAR(NOW()) and MONTH(abnormal.FINISHED_DATE) = MONTH(NOW()))

select ERROR_TYPE errortype, LENGTHTIME lengthtime, OCCURRENCE_DATE occurrencedate, FINISHED_DATE finisheddate, PERIOD_START periodstart, PERIOD_END periodend from abnormal where ((abnormal.occurrence_date >= #{occurrencedate} and abnormal.occurrence_date <= #{finisheddate}) or (abnormal.FINISHED_DATE >= #{occurrencedate} and abnormal.FINISHED_DATE <= #{finisheddate})) and abnormal.user_id = #{user_id} and abnormal.status = #{status}
SELECT SUM(lengthtime) AS lengthtime FROM abnormal WHERE error_type = 'PR013008'

select sum(timestampdiff(day,application_date,occurrence_date) + 1) as datelength from abnormal where createon between date_sub(now(), interval 365 day) and date_sub(now(), interval 0 day) and error_type = 'pr013009' and user_id = #{userid}
select * from abnormal where year(createon)=year(now()) and error_type = 'pr013014' and user_id = #{userid}
